衘字的基本解释

衘
xiɑn
义未详。

衘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xián］
［《廣韻》户監切，平銜，匣。］
亦作“啣1”。亦作“嗛1”。“衔1”的繁体字。亦作“衘1”。
(1)马嚼子。青铜或铁制，放在马口内，用以勒马，控制它的行止。
(2)引申为控制、限制。参见“銜勒”、“銜羈”。
(3)含在嘴里；用嘴咬着。
(4)指喝、饮。参见“銜酒”。
(5)引申为玩味。
(6)心中怀着。
(7)感念。
(8)包含；笼罩。
(9)夹杂；嵌，镶嵌。
(10)犹藏。
(11)衔接；相连。
(12)遵奉；领受。
(13)怀恨。
(14)官阶，官衔。

衘字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【行字部】　衘； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1109第18
【六書正譌】俗銜字。○按《韻會》引《說文》銜从金、行，俗作衘，非，宜歸金部。

衘字的源字形

暂无。

衘
Basic explanation of words
衘
xiɑn
The meaning is unclear.
衘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xián］
["Guangyun" household supervisor cut, flat title, box. ]
Also known as "Title 1." Also known as "嗛1". Traditional characters for "title 1". Also known as "衘1".
(1) Horse bites. Bronze or iron, placed in the horse's mouth, used to rein in the horse to control its movement.
(2) The extension is control and restriction. See "Title Le", "Title Detain".
(3) Contained in the mouth; biting with the mouth.
(4) Refers to drinking and drinking. See "Lake Wine".
(5) Extended to playfulness.
(6) In my heart.
(7) gratitude.
(8) Contains; shrouded.
(9) Inclusion; inlaid, inlaid.
(10) Still Tibetan.
(11) Convergence; connected.
(12) Obey; receive.
(13) Holding a grudge.
(14) Official rank, official title.
衘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Lines and Characters] 　衘; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1109 18
【Six Books Zhengzheng】The vulgar title character. ○According to "Yunhui", the title of "Shuowen" is quoted from Jin and Xing, and it is commonly referred to as Lin and Fei. It should belong to the Ministry of Finance.
